book.title: Insatiable (Cloverleigh Farms, #3)

And even though he was a cute lifeguard at 16 and a hotter-than-hell sheriff‚Äôs deputy at 34, he's always been that protective guy I could trust to keep his hands to himself. Until I walked in on him getting out of the shower and saw his hard, muscular body totally bare and dripping wet. At that moment I never wanted to mess with anything so badly in my entire life.

I should have covered my eyes. Said I was sorry. At the very least, I could have handed him a towel.

In a world filled with lies and secrets where freedom is fleeting, can they learn to love each other enough to survive?

book.title: Carter (HC Heroes #2)
book.description:
Protecting her is his job‚Ä¶falling for her is unexpected.

Carter Sharp‚Ä¶isn‚Äôt always, especially when he‚Äôs in the presence of his sister‚Äôs friend, Mel. The sexy tattoo artist‚Äôs spontaneous, reckless attitude clashes with his ‚Äòby-the-book, never-cut-corners‚Äô creed‚Äîthe one that saved his and his team‚Äôs lives on more than one occasion. His D-Force days are over but working for one of his former Delta brothers as a security expert/investigator has just begun, and it‚Äôs just his luck to land an assignment to secretly protect the artist.

Mel Richardson doesn‚Äôt want or need a man in her life‚Äîfor his safety. She couldn‚Äôt save her father or her brother, so she refuses to let there be a third. But it‚Äôs totally safe to secretly crush on her friend‚Äôs older brother, and even harbor a fantasy or two of the hot, former military guy. Turning a blemish into a work of art, plus rehoming animals who survive the death of their owners are both emotionally rewarding and the perfect distractions to her growing attraction to Carter. The hot woman is strong enough to kick his butt if she discovers he‚Äôs secretly assigned to protect her, but it‚Äôs the soft, vulnerable side he discovers underneath her tough persona that terrifies him. It makes her lethal enough to cut through his defenses and melt his cold heart.

book.title: Mac (HC Heroes #1)

Determined to move on, he gives 110% to his new investigation company‚Ä¶except whenever his brother‚Äôs sexy sister-in-law is near. The sassy woman followed him from central Texas and is a distraction Mac doesn‚Äôt want. So why the hell can‚Äôt he get the hot kiss they shared out of his head?

Stefanie Davis did NOT follow that stubborn wall of muscles to Harland County. She relocated because of work, and thanks to endorsements from his father and his cousin, she has enough clientele to open her own graphic arts business. Too bad it‚Äôs near the sexy as hell security expert whose kiss is as amazing as it is dangerous‚Ä¶to her own good.

book.title: Marshmallow: a BBW romance (Sweet Curves Book 1)
ICED (Boston Terriers Hockey #2)

Oliver Ice, one of Boston University‚Äôs notorious hockey players, has been on my radar since I slammed into his rock-hard body during my first week of college, three years ago. He helped me to my feet, muttered an apology, and ran off after his girlfriend, dashing my hopes of a happily ever after.

Now, he‚Äôs the bartender where I work, and this time, very much single. Night after night I watch the tall, broad, and sexy right winger mixing drinks and being Mr. Personality, while I remind myself how horribly my last relationship ended.

But when Oliver overhears a private conversation, he offers to be the one thing I need more than anything--my pretend boyfriend at a dreaded family reunion.

One weekend was all it was meant to be.

How do I protect my fragile heart when the lines between fantasy and reality blur with our first kiss?

ICED can be read as a standalone.

book.title: Knox (Chicago Blaze, #4)
book.description:
Reese

I‚Äôm done.

Getting ditched at the altar is nothing compared to being humiliated there in front of three hundred shocked guests. Apparently I‚Äôm no good at spotting the signs your man‚Äôs a cheating liar. So I set off solo on my honeymoon to Hawaii, where I realize I‚Äôve got this life thing down just fine on my own.

Friendships and laughter? Yes.

Adventures? Absolutely.

But relationships? Hell no. Never again.


Knox

I‚Äôm a man of few words. My reputation as a moody prick is deserved, but only the handful of people who really know me see the man beneath the professional mask.

I‚Äôm a protector. A warrior. That part is true. But the world doesn‚Äôt get to see the rest of me. And women don‚Äôt seem to mind my gruff exterior‚Äîmy bed‚Äôs always warm.

I‚Äôm content with life‚Äîloving it, even‚Äîor so I thought. But when I meet a beautiful pastry chef with a broken heart and a smile that softens me down to my soul, I realize I wasn‚Äôt really content at all before her.

I only wish I had the words to let her know.

book.title: Hold on to Hope

A best friends-to-lovers, stand-alone romance from New York Times Bestselling Author, A.L. Jackson . . .

Evan Bryant wasn't your typical hero.
But he was mine.
Broken by the worlds' standards, he was still the strongest boy I would ever know.
My best friend. The boy I'd given everything to. My heart, my body, and the promise of forever.
The day I'd needed him most, he walked away.
He left me shattered and questioning the love I'd thought we'd shared.

Three years later, I wasn't prepared for him to return to Gingham Lakes.
It wouldn't have mattered if he wasn't the most beautiful man I'd ever seen.
My fingers still would have ached to caress his skin.
My body still would have begged to get lost in his touch.
And my heart . . . it would have always sung his name.
But time changes things. With it, secrets that could ruin everything.
Can we find a way to love again, or have the fears of our past stolen the hope of our forever . . .

book.title: The Royal Rogue (Nordic Royals #4)

As a single mom, divorcee, social outcast, and forever forgotten about under the magnetism and power of my older brother, King Aksel, I‚Äôm used to being an outlier. Though it doesn‚Äôt matter when my whip-smart nine-year old daughter, Anya, is my whole world anyway.

Then that world of mine gets turned upside down.

I meet Prince Orlando of Monaco, whom the media has dubbed ‚ÄúThe Royal Rogue‚Äù for many good reasons. I can‚Äôt stand that arrogant smirk on his face, the lewd words that leave his lips ‚Äì pretty much everything about him. I especially can‚Äôt stand how infuriatingly sexy he is and how he manages to get under my skin like no one else.

It‚Äôs been a long time since a man could make me feel that way, so you can‚Äôt really blame me for throwing my willpower out the window and succumbing to a brief but torrid affair with him, full of hot, dirty sex and nothing else.

**The Royal Rogue is the 4th book in the Nordic Royals series but can be read as a standalone**

I was na√Øve to think my marriage to Luka Catano might work.

book.title: Hammer (Evil Dead MC, #10)
book.description:
A badass biker and the sexy little sprite that wants nothing to do with him.
They‚Äôre opposites in every way that matters‚Äîexcept one‚Äîthey can‚Äôt keep their eyes off each other.

Hammer watches Tink strut past him without so much as a glance. His eyes moving over her hot little body‚Äîa body that‚Äôs been driving him crazy and keeping him awake at night. She‚Äôs the one chick he‚Äôs been infatuated with for months, but she won‚Äôt give him the time of day.
Hammer just doesn‚Äôt get it. After all, he‚Äôs a big, muscular man who turns female heads wherever he goes. Tattoos cover the skin of his sculpted body, and that combined with being a patched member of the Evil Dead MC does it for most women who are into bad boys. Not Tink, though. Unfortunately for Hammer, the one woman he wants more than any other seems to be immune to him.
Well, he‚Äôs had about enough of her snubbing him like he doesn‚Äôt even exist. He‚Äôs going after what he wants, and what he wants more than anything is that hot little girl with the short white-blonde hair. The one so petite, the guys in the club nicknamed her Tinker Bell.
Yes, that sexy little sprite is going to be his.


Tink is totally aware of Hammer‚Äôs eyes on her as she walks past. Warmth floods her body, like it does every time she‚Äôs near him and he looks at her that way‚Äîlike he‚Äôs undressing her with his eyes and imagining all the sordid things he‚Äôd like to do to her. Things she lies awake at night imagining as well.
But Tink isn‚Äôt willing to risk her heart; not for a man who could hurt her like he could, a man who has already been with her sister. Raven always gets what she wants, and that‚Äôs usually anything she thinks Tink might want.
Tink learned long ago not to even try to compete with her sister. It‚Äôs pointless. So, she‚Äôs carved out a life for herself surrounded by the men of this MC and the women who have become her best friends. It‚Äôs a world she thought her sister would never be interested in, and one where she‚Äôll never have to compete with her.
Apparently, she‚Äôd thought wrong.

What happens when a badass biker wants the one woman he can‚Äôt have?
How far will he go to have her?

About Nicole James
Nicole James is a USA Today and Wall Street Journal bestselling author who loves writing about hot alpha men who'll do anything for the women they love! Her stories are filled with struggle, conflict and real human emotion. She is the author of the Evil Dead MC series, the Brothers Ink Tattoo series and more.

book.title: Unexpected Fall (Unexpected Arrivals #3)
book.description:
Life is full of ups and downs. Events that shape who you are, even those that are filled with heartbreak and tragedy.

What do you do when actions bring devastation?

How do you pick up the pieces and keep moving forward?

One breath.
One second.
One minute.
One hour.
One day at a time, you learn to live with your unexpected fall.

TRAUMA HAS A WAY OF LEAVING ITS MARK.

It took years to do it, but I can finally look in a mirror

If only that were true for the rest of the world.

The whispers, the stares, the pity, they‚Äôre familiar now.
Except his eyes don‚Äôt linger, his demeanor never changes.
Maybe that‚Äôs why I trust him
and take the leap to move in with a virtual stranger.
A stranger who might be more scarred than I am.

YET NOT ALL SCARS ARE LEFT ON THE SURFACE.

The day I got a spot at Sailor‚Äôs Grave Tattoo Parlor, I had everything.
A roof over my head, an honest living, a few friends.
The times when I went without no longer factored.

Until she comes into my life.
Until I offer her a place to stay.
Until she draws me in with that blinding light inside her,
and almost makes me forget
to keep the past in the dark where it belongs.

book.title: I'm Yours
book.description:
I left Lakeside, Montana heartbroken and lost with no desire to ever return.
But life had other plans.
Moving back wasn‚Äôt what I wanted to do, but I‚Äôd do anything for my daughter Emmy. Including put myself right in the path of Sadie Jones.
My daughter‚Äôs new dance teacher.
The reason my heart was never fully opened to anyone else was because it‚Äôs always belonged to her.

When I watched Reed Sanders drive away from Lakeside, I knew my heart would never recover.
He was meant for more than what this town could offer him.
Than what I could offer him.
I tried to warn him to stay away from me but he refused to listen.
If only he would have, maybe then I wouldn‚Äôt feel so broken.

The heart is mysterious. It can be closed off and open at the same time.
Unfortunately, sometimes it takes danger lurking around the corner to make it choose a side.
All I can hope is that one day I can finally hear the words‚Ä¶ I‚Äôm Yours.

book.description:
The first time I met Alexander Harding, I yelled at him for taking my parking spot. Rich and powerful, I saw him as nothing more than my new coldhearted boss. I hated him once but now‚Ä¶now things aren‚Äôt that simple. There‚Äôs a man beneath the beast, and the more I get to know him, the more I fall in love with him.

Though just as I‚Äôm able to envision a future together, the past comes back to haunt us both.

Six years ago, my life changed forever when I found out I was pregnant. The last thing I expected was to see Michael Cooper again, but now he‚Äôs here and is ready to make up for lost time. He wants to be involved in his daughters‚Äô life. My life. And it‚Äôs making me question everything.

I never thought it was possible to be in love with two men at the same time. One from my past, and one I want in my future. My heart is completely torn in two, with each half going in a different direction. I‚Äôd give them each half if I could.

But then I would be left with nothing.

book.title: Enchanting Sebastian (Big Sky Royal, #1)

The first in an all new stand-alone trilogy set in Kristen Proby's Big Sky world, Enchanting Sebastian will take your breath away!

Turning thirty-five doesn‚Äôt mean much to most men. For Sebastian Wakefield, it‚Äôs the end of life as he knows it.
When your father is the King of England, thirty-five is the year that a marriage will be arranged, a suitable bride cementing a future you didn‚Äôt choose. The obvious solution for escaping the archaic laws of the throne is for Sebastian to leave the country. And where better to go than America?

Nina Wolfe has spent her career avoiding scandal. As a Hollywood publicist and minor celebrity in her own right, she knows exactly what it takes to keep the media at bay‚Äîand what will send them into a frenzy.

Prince Sebastian hiding out in Cunningham Falls, Montana is an unlikely story. Ending up in his bed, even more so. And keeping their arrangement out of the press might just be impossible. The ring on her finger is about to spark a firestorm that will change her life, and no professional spin will help Nina fit into the world of royalty.

book.title: Shadow's Surrender (Insurgents MC #14)

The Crossroads of Destiny and Desire.

He‚Äôs a hardcore biker who likes his women easy, his whiskey neat, and his Harley fast. Nothing complicated ‚Ä¶ until a pampered beauty collides into his world.

Shadow is an Insurgent, one of the largest outlaw MCs in Colorado. Riding his Harley, hanging out with his fellow Insurgents, and enjoying the ladies, are his idea of the perfect life.

He likes things simple and free from drama, and that includes his women. Privileged princesses? Definitely not.
Then at his friend‚Äôs engagement party, he sees her. Sexy, curves in all the right places, and a dangerous look in her dark green eyes. Oh yeah ‚Ä¶ his libido is starting to smoke.

All he wants is one long taste.

Scarlett Mansfield comes from one of the richest families in the county. Her life is perfect and well-orchestrated until she sets her eyes on the chiseled biker across the room. The intensity of his gaze makes her blush ‚Ä¶ almost.

Scarlett has complication stamped all over her, but an undeniable desire sizzles between them, and Shadow can‚Äôt stay away.

The Insurgents MC series are standalone romance novels. This is Shadow‚Äôs story. This book contains violence, abuse, strong language, and steamy/graphic sexual scenes. It describes the life and actions of an outlaw motorcycle club. HEA. No cliffhangers.

book.title: Forever and All the Afters
book.description:
He promised me forever.

Then he boarded a plane for a college a thousand miles away and never returned. A decade later there‚Äôs a ring on my finger with a new promise from a new love.

Just as my life falls into place, pretty as the pages of a magazine, my world is knocked over. The moment he touches me everything around me begins to crack, exposing all the lies I‚Äôve told myself.

Every glance reminds me. Every touch ignites.

Things aren‚Äôt how they used to be.

Love isn‚Äôt easy.

The last place Sophia Lancaster wanted to return to was Poplar Falls. It‚Äôs the place that holds all the painful memories and unanswered questions she‚Äôs ever had. One phone call causes her life to take a turn, forcing her back to the town she hasn‚Äôt stepped foot in over twenty years.

His blue eyes, sinful smile, and rough exterior are no match for Sophia. She‚Äôs there for one reason, and it isn‚Äôt to fall in love. The sooner she can get out of this small town and back in New York City‚Äîthe better.

However, fate doesn‚Äôt care for either of their desires. Instead, they‚Äôre forced to deal with each other, finding their differences aren‚Äôt as great as they thought. Sadie Slade was the love of my life.

I left for college promising her I‚Äôd be back in four years.
She stayed behind promising me she‚Äôd wait.
We both broke our promises.

When we bump into each other five years later my feelings for her come rushing to the surface.

I want her back.

How quickly my Sadie Girl has forgotten‚ÄîI‚Äôve never been the type of man who accepts defeat.

Jack Daniels was my entire life.

Until he wasn‚Äôt.
Now he‚Äôs back and thinks we should pick up where we left off.

I miss the simplicity of what we had.

Truthfully‚Ä¶I miss him.

But if I allow him to get too close, he‚Äôll see I‚Äôm not the same girl he left behind five years ago.

Flame is book one in the Men of Inked: Heatwave series by USA Today bestselling author Chelle Bliss. The Men of Inked: Heatwave series features steamy romance, hot heroes, and strong women.

book.description:

Life isn't easy. Single mom, minimum wage, family drama. You know the story. I've come a long way in a short time, though, and it's all worth it. For Jimmy. My grumpy little guy.

Holly Lane has spent her life under the crushing thumbs of her cop father and controlling mother. Now, well into her twenties, she‚Äôs finally getting a fresh start and moving into her own apartment. With his brand-spankin‚Äô new patch, Little Jack has a satisfying life in the Hell‚Äôs Handlers MC. Sure, the town‚Äôs new sheriff is messing with his club, but it‚Äôs nothing they can‚Äôt handle. Life only gets better when LJ‚Äôs dream woman walks out of his fantasies and into the vacant apartment next to his. Holly is sweet as sugar, curvy in ways that make LJ‚Äôs mouth water, and the woman can bake like no other. Personal demons keep LJ from chasing a long-term relationship with any woman, but that doesn‚Äôt mean he can‚Äôt have a little fun with his hot new neighbor.

Holly is pretty sure life is finally on the right track when she meets LJ on her first day in town. Incredibly tall, bearded, tattooed, and strong enough to unload her car without breaking a sweat, her new neighbor just might be perfect.

With outrageous chemistry and a genuine liking for each other, Holly and LJ seem destined for an explosive encounter until a tornado rolls through their budding relationship in the form of Holly‚Äôs father. As the new town sheriff, her father only has one item on his agenda: eliminate the Hell‚Äôs Handlers MC.

book.title: Gage (Love Under the Lights, #1)
book.description:
Gage Ryan was a notorious heartbreaker, on screen and off. A confirmed bachelor, this world-famous actor dashed the hopes of millions of adoring fans when he rejected marriage and commitment: no wedding bells, no baby carriages.

He'd never had cause to consider the alternative, but that all changed the night he met rising star, Morgan Kelly. Too bad her first impression of him was less than favorable.

Although their attraction was instant and mutual, Morgan wasn't interested. Hollywood heartthrobs were trouble. Especially Gage, a man used to women who would do anything for his attention.

Not happening.

But Gage knew how to go after what he wanted, and his desire for Morgan was stronger than anything he'd ever felt before. Powerful enough to make him reconsider his previously held beliefs on love and longevity. He just had to convince her of how serious he was. It was a good thing he was ready for the chase.

book.title: Packaged Love (Love at First Sight #2)
book.description:
‚ÄúAll I wanted to do was make a simple package exchange, then the next thing I know Mr. Tall, Dark, Handsome and Jerk-Face is slamming me to the ground and threatening me with jail and other real pleasant experiences. Yep, my day certainly could be better.‚Äù‚ÄîEmma Wolcott

Who knew a delivery guy‚Äôs screw-up could lead to finding ‚Äúthe one?‚Äù

Ethan Wescott instantly falls for the gorgeous, little thief he catches stealing his package. Once he realizes it‚Äôs all a misunderstanding, he‚Äôs left trying to convince Emma even a caveman jerk deserves the chance to redeem himself. He‚Äôs going to have his work cut out for him because so far, she isn‚Äôt too impressed.

book.title: All The Forbidden Things
book.description:
When all that you want, is all that‚Äôs forbidden...

I‚Äôve known him my entire life.
Before marriage.
Before fatherhood.
Before betrayal.
Now, he‚Äôs one of rock‚Äôs bad-boys trying to be good.
Trying to be the best father he can for his daughter.
He‚Äôs my brother‚Äôs best friend.
He‚Äôs my boss.
He has a wife.
Max isn‚Äôt mine to have, but I want him all the same.
And I haven‚Äôt survived all that I have to not go after what I want.

Her story is a tragedy, mine‚Äôs a publicity disaster.

Just when I needed her most, she walked back into my life, and the timing couldn‚Äôt be worse.
With a newborn baby, a divorce, an album to record, and a world tour to plan, I don‚Äôt need the distraction.
She‚Äôs off limits.
She‚Äôs my best friend‚Äôs little sister.
She‚Äôs my nanny.
Billie‚Äôs a golden drop of sexy sun on a grey autumn day, tempting me into the light and a life full of possibilities.
A life not meant for us.

book.title: Hard Place (Hard to Love, #1)
book.description:
Cold. Callous. Cocky.

A total playboy with abs for days, a panty-melting smirk, and a face the gods themselves would be jealous of.

And he‚Äôs my new boss.

None of that matters, because as a single mom, men like Alexander Harding are the last thing I need. What I do need is this job, so I‚Äôm going to keep my head down, work hard, and avoid that asshole as much as humanly possible.

But then he gives me an offer I can‚Äôt refuse, even though everything inside of me is warning me to run away and never look back.

It‚Äôs just one weekend.

One weekend to convince a potential client that Alexander has changed from the player who spent more time in the bedroom than the boardroom into a family man they‚Äôd be happy to go into business with.

But the more time I spend with him, the more I realize that there might be a beating heart buried under his designer shirts and spectacular pecs after all‚Ä¶which is bad news for me.

Because the only thing worse than hating your boss is falling in love with him.

review.body: Didn‚Äôt realize it was a duet, not a fan of them

book.title: Primal Howl (Primal Howlers MC, #1)
book.description:
Orion
I‚Äôm the oldest son of MC royalty. My father founded the Primal Howlers and he expects me to wear his patch one day. The problem is, I don‚Äôt know if that‚Äôs what I want. Lately, I couldn‚Äôt give two sh*ts about anything.

Until her.

Raquel
I moved to Monument, Colorado to write my thesis and get some much-needed distance from my overbearing family. What I didn‚Äôt expect was to find is myself hung up on a biker who appears to have nothing to lose.

I, however, have everything to lose and I‚Äôm worried Orion just might be my downfall.

book.title: Wrecked
book.description:
Getting married at eighteen wasn't the smartest idea but ... I'd been in love. Bryce, with his perfect words, his money, and all-American good looks. He had pulled me in, and when he spit me out, I'd barely been left alive.
Now at twenty two and divorced, I just wanted to build a life for myself on my own terms. Free of fear.

First job. First crappy apartment. First taste of freedom.

Enter Ethan King. The guy from high school I never had a chance with. As the leader of the local motorcycle gang, he's not exactly an outstanding citizen, but he's the one bright spot in my life. He's exactly what I need right now. Until Bryce, who never could accept losing, decides he's not ready to let me go. And if there is one thing I know about that monster, it's that he has no problem destroying everything in my world.

Only this time I have Ethan King. And no one messes with a King.

*Full length- standalone novel with adult sexy scenes.
*Dark romance

book.title: Already Gone
book.description:
Falling in love is easy‚Ä¶

New Hope, South Carolina is my home. It‚Äôs where I grew up, got into trouble, and fell in love for the first time. Scarlett Kincaid was more than the girl next door, she was my best friend, until she decided that small town life wasn‚Äôt for her. One minute she was here, and the next she was gone.

The girl I used to fish with down at the creek is now the biggest name in country music. She headlines world tours, has won four Grammy‚Äôs, and I haven‚Äôt seen her since. Until today when she sped through town in her fancy car. One look at her big brown eyes was all it took to stir up a whole slew of emotions. Emotions I‚Äôd long ago buried and sure as hell don‚Äôt have time for.

It‚Äôs the aftermath that‚Äôs hard‚Ä¶

There are two things in my life that matter. My music, and my dad. Twelve years ago, I packed a bag and chased my dream. Leaving New Hope and escaping the gossip mill was the easiest decision I ever made. I never planned to return, but my father needs me, and he always comes first. So, I did what I had to do. I cut my tour short and came home, despite having a sister who hates me, and a community that doesn‚Äôt trust me. And then there‚Äôs Tucker Andrews.

When he propped an arm on the roof of my car, pulled down his sunglasses and flashed his police badge, I nearly swallowed my tongue. Gone is the lanky boy who used to throw rocks at me and pull my pigtails. Tucker is now a six-foot package of brawny, sexy man wrapped in more muscle than I have hit singles. Did I mention he‚Äôs a cop and a single dad?

My goal was to help Dad, and get back to my life. But what am I supposed to when the life that used to strangle me suddenly fits like a glove, and makes me dream of things I never thought I‚Äôd have? What happens when the boy I walked away from years ago becomes one of the most important people in my life? I don‚Äôt have room in my life for a man much less love.

Right?

Because it‚Äôs impossible to hold onto someone who‚Äôs already gone.

book.title: Wild Tendy (IceCats, #2)
book.description:
Nico Merryweather loves women‚Äîall women. Sure, they‚Äôre sexy and fun. But ‚ÄúPlayer‚Äù is an easy reputation to hide behind, a way to keep the good times rolling and reality at bay. He‚Äôs loud, he‚Äôs cocky, he says exactly what he‚Äôs thinking, and people just laugh it off because they think they know him. But Nico makes sure no one is close enough to know the truth. With a new season starting, he is ready to play the game he can control. They‚Äôll all be watching Nico, the goalie, but they‚Äôll never know the man behind the mask who is just trying to breathe. He hasn‚Äôt ever wanted anyone close enough to him to see the truth, until Aviva rams herself into his ass. Literally.

Aviva Pearce‚Äôs life is a collection of bad days all wrapped up without a bow. If it can go wrong, it will. All she wants is to run her business, take care of her sister, and keep her head above water. But with a father who is out to ruin her like he has himself and debt trying to drown her, it‚Äôs hard to stay afloat. Aviva isn‚Äôt the type to waste time dwelling on her misfortunes or to give up, though. She‚Äôs got too much fight in her. And she definitely doesn‚Äôt have time to waste on the wildly sexy, rich, showboating goaltender everyone wants. She‚Äôs got goals.

What she doesn‚Äôt know is that Nico has goals of his own.

And she‚Äôs number one on his list.

book.title: Finding Storm (The Storm, #4)
book.description:
The son of an icon.

He was a legend. Rock royalty.

A man I never met.

But I‚Äôm measured against him in every aspect of my life.

The only time I feel like me ‚Ä¶ the real me ‚Ä¶ is when I‚Äôm onstage with my band. But the more we grow in popularity, the more people compare me to him.

I‚Äôm not him. And I never will be. If only everyone could figure that out for themselves.

I need a break from it all.

Then, a confrontation has me jumping in my car, putting LA in my rearview mirror. And a stupid mistake ends up with my car on the side of the road. And straight into the path of a girl who is the exact opposite of everyone else in my life.

She‚Äôs like everything I used to know.

And she has no clue who I am.

Even if she did, I don‚Äôt think she‚Äôd care.

She thinks I‚Äôm cavalier.

I think she‚Äôs intriguing. And hot. Let‚Äôs not forget hot.

I‚Äôm stuck in this town overnight while my car is being fixed. But I‚Äôm thinking I‚Äôm gonna stick around a bit longer.

I‚Äôm Storm Slater, lead guitarist in Slater Raze and the only child of the late, great Jonny Creed. But, here, right now ‚Ä¶ I‚Äôm nobody. Just a regular guy.

I‚Äôm liking it a whole lot.

And I‚Äôm liking her even more.

book.title: Cash (The Ride Series Second Generation Book 3)
Bronx (The Lost Boys MC #3)
book.description:
There‚Äôs no one left to trust.

Our contacts turned.
The gang we trusted, now works with the cop who betrayed us.
The club is at risk like never before.
And I would do anything to protect them all.
So, when an innocent and gorgeous girl storms into my life, she throws everything off course..
All I want is her long legs wrapped around my waist.
Freya is determined to search for her half sister, but things got complicated.
The only clue she has to find her sister is a picture ‚Äì of Hayley.
I don‚Äôt know who to trust.
Only, Freya keeps pulling me back in.
When she is threatened, I‚Äôll stop at nothing to keep her safe.
Even if that means going against my club.

book.title: Stone (The Lost Boys MC #2)
book.description:
I always get what I want. Until now.
The club has been infiltrated.
There‚Äôs a cop who knows too much.
And it‚Äôs my job as President to clean up this sh*t.
I can‚Äôt afford any distractions.
But when Hayley slams into my bike, she‚Äôs all I think about.
Her thick curves make me want to take her for a ride.
She quickly becomes the stress relief that I need.
However, the closer we get, the more questions about the club she has.
I won‚Äôt risk the club again with another outsider.
Even though I‚Äôm starting to feel Hayley could be so much more.
Can I trust her with the most important part of my life‚Ä¶and my heart?

Stone is the second book in The Lost Boys MC series.

book.title: Hard Asset (Cobra Elite, #2)
book.description:
A perilous mission‚Ä¶

Shanti Lahiri‚Äôs tragic family history inspired her to fight for justice. Now a prosecutor with the International Criminal Court, she doesn‚Äôt have time for dating or relationships. When an investigation takes her to the Rohingya refugee camps in her father‚Äôs homeland of Bangladesh, the last thing she wants is an armed security team following her everywhere and frightening her already traumatized witnesses. But others who‚Äôve tried to investigate these crimes have gone missing, and Shanti doesn‚Äôt want to be the next one to disappear. Despite her misgivings, she has no choice but to accept their protection. And, no, the fact that the team‚Äôs leader is lethally sexy has nothing to do with her decision.

An undeniable attraction‚Ä¶

Connor O‚ÄôNeal left the Unit‚ÄîDelta Force‚Äîafter a decade of war, scarred both inside and out. Now an operative with Cobra International Security, he‚Äôs been tasked with protecting Shanti in one of the most dangerous parts of the world. He can handle anything the bad guys throw at him, but nothing prepares him for the instant attraction he feels to Shanti. From the first moment he sees her, he wants her. Too bad, because clients are strictly off-limits, and he‚Äôs a man who follows the rules‚Äîmost of the time. Besides, he can‚Äôt afford any distractions when Shanti‚Äôs life is on the line.

A merciless enemy‚Ä¶

But something about Shanti breaks through Connor‚Äôs defenses, forcing him to confront his demons. As their mutual desire transforms into reckless passion, Shanti discovers evidence crucial to putting a mastermind of genocide behind bars. Connor knows her life is in immediate danger, but his plan to get her out of the country comes crashing down when a traitor strikes, leaving the two of them stranded in the jungles of Myanmar. Now on the run from a ruthless killer and his army, Connor and Shanti are fighting for survival‚Äîand a chance at the love of a lifetime.

book.title: Take Me Now (The Knight Brothers #3.5)
book.description:
He acts like he barely knows her.

But she knows he‚Äôs the one.

Matt Banks was ready to tell Harper Sanders that he loved her, that he‚Äôd always loved her and that even though they were young, she was his forever girl.

Then her brother stepped in, wanting more for his sister than a garage owner. Too young to stand up for himself, Matt made her brother a promise that he‚Äôs regretted every day since.

After years of being ignored by the guy she‚Äôs always loved, Harper is on a dating binge. No one is Matt, but a girl can keep on trying. Then she gets stranded on the side of the road, and she has no choice but to call the only mechanic in town.

Matt comes to her rescue, and then to her bed. It‚Äôs an idyllic, passion-filled weekend‚Äîbut there‚Äôs still the matter of his promise. And a man‚Äôs word is his bond.

NOTE: Take Me Now is a never before published SHORT story in the Knight Brothers series.

book.title: Holding Mia (Rockers' Legacy #1)
book.description:
They call me the rocker‚Äôs princess, some even call me the dance prodigy, but none of them knows the real Mia Armstrong.

Now that dancing is no longer my future, I don‚Äôt know either.

All I want is the opportunity to find out, to have some time to try being just a little normal. To discover who this new girl is.

I fought for the chance to go to college on my own. Without the guards overshadowing my shot at a real college experience, drawing unwanted attention and making it impossible to learn new things about myself.

My goal was to get my degree and start my own dance school. Barrick wasn‚Äôt part of that goal, but suddenly, he was everywhere‚Äîand I was so damn tempted. His arms felt so good wrapped around me, making me feel safer than I‚Äôd ever felt in my life.

But Barrick had more secrets than I could ever hope to uncover.

And one just might break me completely.

book.title: Mason Wilder (Radical Rock Stars Next Generation Duet, #2)
book.description:
Everything in my life has had a predetermined path. The success of the band had to come first. I‚Äôve put my feelings on hold long enough. The time is finally right. Mason Wilder is America's most eligible rock star. Now, I'm going to make him mine.

She's my best friend's little sister. She's off limits. She's Tessa Blade Garcia, a girl who knows what she wants and isn't afraid to go after it. And now she's after me.

I've know her since the day she was born, but it's taken me 22 years to realize how much I love her. Just when everything seems perfect, my world get turned upside down, and I need to take sides between people I've loved and trusted my entire life, and someone I never thought I'd see again.

book.title: Lucas Blade (Radical Rock Stars Next Generation Duet, #1)
book.description:
The progeny of legendary punk rock band Immortal Angel bring you an enemies-to-lovers and friends-to-lovers duet.

Lucas Blade, Radical Rock Stars Next Generation Duet, Book #1

He‚Äôs the son of guitar legend, Tommy Blade. He's smart. He's gorgeous. He's talented beyond belief. He‚Äôs perfect. And he knows it. He‚Äôs also giving me the opportunity of a lifetime. He‚Äôs trying to teach me his wisdom, but I just want to play music. He‚Äôs so damn confident and self-assured it makes me crazy. He's also breaking through all of my barriers.

She‚Äôs a spitfire. She's got a smart mouth and an answer for everything. I‚Äôm trying to help her, but she‚Äôs fighting me every step of the way. She challenges me, something no one has ever done before. I can‚Äôt stand her, but I can‚Äôt stop thinking about her, either.

Lucas Blade was born into a world of extravagance.
Sindy Cavanaugh can barely afford to pay for necessities.

He has a close and loving family who support him.
She has dysfunctional parents who only call her for money.

Their backgrounds couldn‚Äôt be more different, but music brought them together.

From the moment they meet, they challenge one another with defiant attitudes and oversized egos, and their constant arguing disrupts rehearsals. They come to realize that the turbulence between them is really only a guise for suppressed passion.

With their band about to go mainstream, they need to figure out if they should put their feelings on hold or risk everything they‚Äôve worked toward.

book.title: CHECKED (Boston Terriers Hockey #1)
book.description:
They call him ‚ÄòWilde Man‚Äô. Rumor has it he‚Äôs an animal on the ice and between the sheets.

Like the rest of the female population, I‚Äôve been crushing on Clancy Wilde, the captain of Boston University‚Äôs hockey team, since the first time I saw him. Big, blond, and charming, he ticks all the boxes.

When we find ourselves at a wedding, drunk and flirting, I know I can finally check this tattooed, bad boy, hockey player off my wish list.

One night is all it was meant to be, until I see two pink lines on the pregnancy test.

How did the notch on my belt turn into a ball and chain?

book.title: Park Avenue Player
book.description:
It started out like any normal day.

Then the fender bender happened.

The guy I collided with drove an expensive car and was drop-dead gorgeous. Too bad he was also a total jerk. We argued over whose fault it was and any other thing that came out of his condescending mouth.

Eventually, the police came and we went our separate ways. The insurance companies would have to figure things out. I had a job interview to get to anyway‚Äîone I was excited about.

Though that excitement changed to disappointment the moment the person interviewing me walked in. The guy from the accident.

Whoops!

Yeah, so I didn‚Äôt get the position.

The problem was, I really wanted it. No, I needed it. Anything to get me out of my current career and back into working with kids.

So, even though Hollis LaCroix was as intimidating as he was devastatingly handsome, I went back to see him and begged for a chance.

To my surprise, he gave me a shot taking care of his troubled niece.

At least my attraction to him wouldn‚Äôt be able to go anywhere. I wasn‚Äôt about to jeopardize my job or the strong bond Hailey and I formed.

But resisting the magnetic pull between us wasn‚Äôt that simple. (Then there was our little underwear game‚Äîdon‚Äôt ask.)

We continued to flirt without crossing the line‚Äîuntil it finally happened.

This is the part of the story where we fall in love and live happily ever after, right?

Well, life has a way of throwing some major curveballs.

Ours was one I didn‚Äôt see coming.

book.title: Stencil: Sugar and Spice, Ink
book.description:
Our arrangement was simple‚Äîjust physical and definitely no falling in love. That seemed easy enough until a positive pregnancy test changed everything. He‚Äôs loud, crude, sexy, and can cook and he‚Äôs bound and determined to make me his, but I‚Äôve been burned before and if I let him in, and things don‚Äôt work out for us, well, it‚Äôs more than just my heart on the line.

Can I push past my issues to open my heart to that big beautiful man? As we navigate this unfamiliar terrain his enthusiasm begins to knock down the walls I‚Äôve always kept around me, but we keep hitting obstacles that could ruin everything we‚Äôre trying to build.

Am I strong enough to battle my own demons to move forward to a future that could promise to be everything I could‚Äôve hoped for?

book.title: Realism: Sugar and Spice, Ink (Sugar and Spice, Ink, #1)
book.description:
"A single parent, opposites attract romance that will captivate you from the very first page"- New York Times bestselling author, Kaylee Ryan


Ordinary, typical, conformed, are words never used to describe me. I've never been one to play by the rules. It's my world, my life and I do things my way.



I see the way they stare at my body covered in tattoos and my lavender hair, I just don't give a damn. There is only one thing in this world that can get me fired up, that's screwing with my daughter. As a single mom, it's my job to protect her, fight for her. She is and will always be my top priority.


So, when I get a call that she's in trouble at school, with a boy- no less, my claws are out and ready to strike. And the boy's father, some high society stockbroker, isn't about to deter me. I don't care how sexy, smart and rugged he is.




Opposites may attract, and I've been down that road before, it's one I never plan to travel again. A man like that would never be interested in a woman like me. That I know for certain, after all I'm a realist.

book.title: Dirty Like Seth (Dirty, #3)
book.description:
They all thought they knew him‚Ä¶
but she knew his heart.

Seth Brothers had it all: the hottest album in the world, more money than he‚Äôd ever dreamed of, and Dirty‚Äîthe band he loved like family. But as Dirty hit the big time, Seth hit bottom.

Now all Seth‚Äôs got is the guitar on his back, a heart full of regrets, and one last chance to get it all back‚Ä¶ including the one thing he never expected.

Her.

Elle Delacroix has it all‚Äîtalent, money, fame‚Ä¶ except the one thing that truly matters.

Love‚Ä¶

The only thing Seth has left to give.

There are two sides to every rock ‚Äôn‚Äô roll story;
it‚Äôs time for Seth to tell his.

Dirty Like Seth is the third full-length novel in the Dirty series‚Äîa rockstar romance series about the members of the rock band Dirty and the women and men who love them.

Novels in the Dirty series are interconnected standalones, each with an HEA; other books (novella/story collection) are not HEA, but are essential pieces of the overall story arcs. (There are ongoing storylines that develop throughout the series; reading them in order is not crucial but is HIGHLY recommended.)

Reading order:
Dirty Like Me (Dirty #1)
Dirty Like Us (Dirty #0.5) (novella)
Dirty Like Brody (Dirty #2)
A Dirty Wedding Night (Dirty #2.5)(story collection)
Dirty Like Seth (Dirty #3)
Dirty Like Dylan (Dirty #4)
Dirty Like Jude (Dirty #5)
Dirty Like Zane (Dirty #6)

book.title: Dirty Like Jude (Dirty, #5)
book.description:
He was her first true love‚Ä¶
And the worst mistake she ever made.

There‚Äôs always been a spark between Jude Grayson and Roni ‚ÄúWild Card‚Äù Webber.

Unfortunately, whenever it ignites‚Ä¶ it explodes.

And they both get burned.

As head of security for Dirty‚Äîhis best friend‚Äôs rock band‚Äîand a member of the West Coast Kings motorcycle club, Jude had a choice to make, long ago. Loyalty or love. Brotherhood or¬†her.

But now the woman he left behind is suddenly everywhere he turns.

Problem is, Roni‚Äôs still got a wild side‚Äîand another biker for a boyfriend.

‚Ä¶ And Jude‚Äôs got a fire for her that just won‚Äôt die.

Roni and Jude are about to play a dangerous game.
A game they‚Äôve never known how to win...
and their hearts can‚Äôt afford to lose.


Dirty Like Jude is the fifth full-length novel in the Dirty series‚Äîa rockstar romance series about the members of the rock band Dirty and the women and men who love them.

Novels in the Dirty series are interconnected standalones, each with an HEA; other books (novella/story collection) are not HEA, but are essential pieces of the overall story arcs. (There are ongoing storylines that develop throughout the series; reading them in order is not crucial but is HIGHLY recommended.)

Reading order:
Dirty Like Me (Dirty #1)
Dirty Like Us (Dirty #0.5) (novella)
Dirty Like Brody (Dirty #2)
A Dirty Wedding Night (Dirty #2.5)(story collection)
Dirty Like Seth (Dirty #3)
Dirty Like Dylan (Dirty #4)
Dirty Like Jude (Dirty #5)
Dirty Like Zane (Dirty #6)

book.title: Dirty Like Brody (Dirty, #2)
book.description:
He was all she ever wanted. Then she broke his heart‚Ä¶

As longtime manager of Dirty, the hottest rock band on the planet, gorgeous and brooding Brody Mason has had his share of beautiful women. Yet the only one he‚Äôs ever wanted is the one he never had‚Äîthe one who tore his heart out.

Beautiful and elusive Jessa Mayes appears to have it all. Talent, money, and a glamorous life. But she also has a secret. Six years ago, she¬†ran away‚Äîfrom her dream career as a songwriter with Dirty, and the only man she‚Äôs ever loved‚Äîwithout telling anyone why.

Now Jessa‚Äôs¬†doing the one thing she swore she‚Äôd never do. She‚Äôs coming home‚Äîto be a bridesmaid in her brother‚Äôs rock star wedding‚Ä¶ and face the mistakes of her past.

It won‚Äôt be easy.

Love this intense never is.

Dirty Like Brody¬†is the second full-length novel in the Dirty series‚Äîa rockstar romance series about the members of the rock band Dirty and the women and men who love them.

Novels in the Dirty series are interconnected standalones, each with an HEA. (There are ongoing storylines that develop throughout the series, so reading them in order is not crucial but is recommended.)

Reading order:
Dirty Like Me (Dirty #1)
Dirty Like Us (Dirty #0.5) (novella)
Dirty Like Brody (Dirty #2)

book.title: Dirty Like Me (Dirty, #1)
book.description:
A gorgeous rock star.
An indecent proposal.
How can a girl resist?

Struggling barista Katie Bloom doesn‚Äôt even know who Jesse Mayes is until she inadvertently wins the coveted role of sex kitten in his hot new music video. But by the time she‚Äôs in bed with him, she knows his reputation.

Love maker. Heartbreaker.

Making out with a stranger in front of a camera crew isn‚Äôt how Katie imagined herself getting over a broken heart, but when Jesse touches her, sparks fly. The sex is fake but the chemistry is real, and soon the steamy video is blazing up the charts.

Then Jesse makes Katie an irresistible offer: act as his girlfriend for six weeks while he promotes his new album. The only catch? Their sizzling make-out sessions will be for the cameras only.

Which is fine with Katie, since she's not about to trust her heart to rock's most legendary lover. Her body? Maybe‚Ä¶

book.title: Gypsy King (Tin Gypsy, #1)
book.description:
The former Tin Gypsy motorcycle club has everyone in Clifton Forge, Montana convinced they‚Äôve locked their clubhouse doors and ripped off their patches. Everyone but Bryce Ryan. There‚Äôs more happening at the club‚Äôs garage than muscle car restorations and Harley rebuilds. Her instincts are screaming there‚Äôs a story‚Äîone she‚Äôs going to tell.

As the new owner of the small town‚Äôs newspaper, Bryce is hungry for more than birth announcements and obituaries. When a woman is brutally killed and all signs point to the Tin Gypsies, Bryce is determined to expose the club and their leader, Kingston ‚ÄúDash‚Äù Slater, as murderers.

Bryce bests Dash match after match, disappointed her rugged and handsome opponent turns out to be an underwhelming adversary. Secrets are exposed. Truths defeat lies. Bryce is poised to win this battle in a landslide.

Then Dash breaks all the rules and tips the scales.

One kiss, and she‚Äôs fighting to save more than just her story. She‚Äôs fighting to save her heart from the Gypsy King.

review.body: Devney Perry never disappoints , can‚Äôt wait for the next book

book.title: This Is Love (This is, #3)
book.description:
Vivienne

Never fall in love.
That was my motto, and I was sticking to it.
Having my heart broken once was enough, and I never wanted to do it again.
He was supposed to be a one-night stand, the only thing I do.
One rule shouldn‚Äôt be so hard to follow, but then I went back for seconds, then thirds.

After that, I lost count of the number of times I lost myself in his arms.
When I wasn‚Äôt paying attention, my guard slipped.

Mark

They call me Private Mark for a reason‚Äîmy whole life is a secret.
For two years, we danced around each other until I got her right where I wanted her ... under me.
Now that I had her, I wasn't letting her go. I thought we were on the same page.
I thought we were building something great.

Boy, was I ever wrong.

I had no idea that while I was falling in love, she was trying to convince herself we were temporary.
She thought I‚Äôd walk away.

She was wrong.

Now it's time to convince her she wants us too and to show her that the crazy, wild thing we have ... This Is Love.

book.title: Dare Me Tonight (The Knight Brothers, #3)
book.description:
One virgin, one night, one surprise baby‚Ä¶

For Ethan Knight, managing his empire is his priority. Women, not so much. But when a favor leads to him meeting sexy, driven Sienna Dare at a black tie corporate event, his interest is piqued along with his desire, and his infamous control slips as he joins her for an unforgettable night in bed.

Sienna Dare is trying to figure out the direction of her life when she meets enigmatic Ethan Knight‚Äîa strong, confident man so hot and irresistible he's the one she finally relinquishes her v-card to.

The problem? Ethan has a billion dollar contract with Sienna's brother at stake. An overly-protective brother who doesn't take it well when he finds out his business associate bedded his much younger sister. Oh, and she's pregnant, too...

book.title: Wrapped Up in You (Heartbreaker Bay, #8)
book.description:
It‚Äôs love. Trust me.

After a lifetime on the move, Ivy Snow is an expert in all things temporary‚Äîschools, friends, and way too many Mr. Wrongs. Now that she owns a successful taco truck in San Francisco and an apartment to call home, Ivy‚Äôs reinvented life is on solid ground. And she‚Äôs guarded against anything that can rock it. Like the realities of a past she‚Äôs worked hard to cover up. And especially Kel O‚ÄôDonnell. Too hot not to set off alarms, he screams temporary. If only his whispers weren‚Äôt so delightfully naughty and irresistible.

Kel, an Idaho sheriff and ranch owner, is on vacay, but Ivy‚Äôs a spicy reason to give his short-terms plans a second thought. Best of all, she‚Äôs a tonic for his untrusting heart, burned once and still in repair. But when Ivy‚Äôs past intrudes on a perfect romance, Kel fears that everything she‚Äôs told him has been a perfect lie. Now, if only Ivy‚Äôs willing to share, Kel will fight for a true love story.

book.title: Fury (Heaven Hill Generations #3)
book.description:
Family is number one; whether they are blood related or patched in.

At thirteen-years-old, the bastard son of an asshole who wanted me to fail, I learned that lesson.

Thanks to one man.

Liam Walker raised me, taught me how to be an adult, and loved the hell out of my mother, me, and my sisters. He funneled my anger into productiveness when teenage me lost the love of his life. Because of him, I knew how to love her when she came back. His dedication to me and my sisters was the example I needed when my twins were born.

Tracing his footsteps may not have been my birthright, but him turning over the president patch to me is what I‚Äôve waited for since I was thirteen. Calm, cool, and collected ‚Äì that‚Äôs how he ran The Heaven Hill MC ‚Äì and it‚Äôs how I‚Äôve run it too.

Until now.

Ambushed on our own streets. Fighting an enemy we didn‚Äôt know we had. Innocent people hurt all because of a misguided sense of entitlement.

The difference between me and Liam? I have anger I‚Äôve held back, kept my emotions under control for half my life, been the loving man I‚Äôm supposed to be, but for this piece of shit who threatened us? I‚Äôm about to unleash something he‚Äôs never seen before.

My fury.

book.title: Unexpected Fight (Unexpected Arrivals #2)
book.description:
No matter how much you plan or try to prepare for what‚Äôs to come, life always sends you on an alternate path.

We‚Äôre taking each curve in the road as it bends.

Except what do you do when you don‚Äôt see the curve coming?

We‚Äôre struggling, learning to navigate in total darkness.

One breath.
One second.
One minute.
One hour.
One day at a time, we‚Äôre learning to live with our unexpected fight.

book.title: Whipped
book.description:
There wasn‚Äôt much I wanted out of life but having my bakery succeed, being able to continue doing what I loved to do, and finding a woman who could make me feel whole.‚Ä©

And then the moment she walked into my bakery, I knew there would be no other for me.

‚Ä©For months, I watched her sit at that little table in the corner and read. For months, I thought of a million different things I wanted to say to her.‚Ä©

I might not have stalked her, but I sure as hell wanted to. I thought about it. Finding more out about Zara, and all the things I wanted to do to her, had become an obsession. ‚Ä©Zara was gorgeous and curvy ‚Ä¶ exactly the type of woman I fantasized about having by my side.‚Ä©

But finding the courage to man up and go after what I wanted‚Äîher‚Äîwas harder than I thought. I guess when you find the perfect person for you, the idea of being rejected could turn anyone into a coward.

‚Ä©Until one day I wasn‚Äôt willing to let her walk by without me saying something to her. I couldn‚Äôt stay away. I wanted more.‚Ä©

Whipped, that‚Äôs what I was, but only for Zara.

book.title: The Hardest Hit
book.description:
Melanie Holstein is the woman I let slip right through my fingertips.

One night in Vegas with the fiery woman that gave as good as she got was enough for me to know that she‚Äôs the one.

Except for a few small problems.
I‚Äôm Aiden Shaw, the star quarterback for a team that‚Äôs nine hundred miles away from her home in Atlanta.
She doesn‚Äôt want kids and I have three rowdy boys that take up all of my free time.

The timing for us just never seems right and after so many missed connections, I‚Äôve nearly given up on us.

Until my career takes a devastating turn.

Mel‚Äôs the first one by my side, determined to put me back together.
Ignoring my bitterness and pain, she heals more than just my injured leg and finally, there seems to be a future for us.

But, Lady Luck has never been on our side.
And the next tragedy that blindsides us may just be the hardest hit of all.

book.title: The Devil's Angels MC: Book 2 - Axel
book.title_without_series: The Devil's Angels MC: Book 2 - Axel

book.title: Catching Him (How to Catch an Alpha #1)
book.description:
From New York Times and USA Today bestselling author Aurora Rose Reynolds comes the first novel in the fun, sexy, and thrilling How to Catch an Alpha series.

Leah Emerson isn‚Äôt looking for a man‚Äîshe‚Äôs looking for the right man. But her mother‚Äôs idea of a great catch leaves her cold, and she‚Äôs pretty sure her cocky, arrogant, and way too good-looking new neighbor isn‚Äôt the one either. If only her wayward cat would stop jumping through his window, she could get on with her life.

Tyler Duncan moved into town for a new job, not to fall in love. But he always goes after the things he wants in life with steadfast determination‚Ä¶and he wants Leah Emerson. He wants her smiles, he wants her touch, and he definitely wants her in bed.

Unfortunately, someone else wants Leah‚Äîin the worst way. Now Tyler‚Äôs on a mission to protect the woman he‚Äôs falling in love with while proving he‚Äôs worth falling for, and Leah must decide whether Tyler is a catch worth catching‚Ä¶

book.title: Game Changer (Change of Hearts, #1)
book.description:
Up until two years ago, I was living large and my life‚Äôs priorities were anchored to three things ‚Äì my NBA stardom, money and celebrity.

I was also a colossal dick.

Until one night turned my world upside down and I suffered unspeakable loss. That event changed the man I was and made me a widowed-single father.

Now I‚Äôm a desperate parent trying to raise my special needs son and find him a trustworthy live-in nanny.

Grad student Brooklyn Hayes may be the one, with her single-minded focus on caring for my son and finishing her Master‚Äôs degree. She‚Äôs the perfect fit for our needs.

Maybe too perfect‚Ä¶ with her bright smile, nurturing kindness and gentle touch. Caleb isn‚Äôt the only one who‚Äôs fallen for her.

I don‚Äôt know when or how it happened, but she changed the game for me. Turning my losing streak into a winning second-half.

Game Changer is a Single Dad/Nanny Romance.

book.title: Southern Gentleman (Charleston Heat, #3)
book.description:
I know two things when I meet my new boss, Greyson Parker Montgomery III.
One, he‚Äôs an egomaniac. And two, we‚Äôre going to get naked.
Something I didn‚Äôt know? That I‚Äôd end up pregnant.

No one is more surprised by our off-the-charts chemistry than me. I‚Äôm a free spirit with a passion for design and a taste for the bohemian. Greyson is a cocky venture capitalist who‚Äôs as pretentious as his sharply cut power suits.

He owns half of Charleston, and has the other half at his beck and call. But the only place he owns me is in bed...or in the backseat of his car, boneless and begging for mercy.

We argue over contracts and costs all day long. Behind closed doors, however, we engage in a different kind of business. The kind that has me surrendering to his unique brand of dominance.

Our no-strings attached arrangement suits me just fine. Until I wake up one morning with what I think is a wicked hangover.

Only it‚Äôs not a hangover.

I thought Greyson was a typical ‚Äúgreed is good‚Äù grump. But when he demands to be involved in the life we accidentally created, I start to see a different side of him. One that‚Äôs more gentleman than jerk.Am I crazy to think we could be a family together? Or is making me fall for him just another one of his power plays?

SOUTHERN GENTLEMAN is a STANDALONE, full length, accidental pregnancy/enemies-to-lovers romance.

book.title: Until December (Until Her/Him, #8)
book.description:
Gareth Black is drawn to December Mayson the moment he spots her across the room at her cousin‚Äôs wedding. When he approaches the beautiful woman, she captivates him with her shyness and wit, making him crave her.

With a pull so strong it‚Äôs impossible to ignore, December knows there‚Äôs something between her and Gareth. She just hopes they‚Äôre capable of jumping the hurdles ahead of them.

Two boys, an ex, a surprise that will change everything, and a disgruntled co-worker, guarantee these two will have their work cut out for them if they are going to find their happily ever after.

book.title: Drunk Girl (Lyrics and Love, #2)
book.description:
A NEW STANDALONE Title from Samantha Lind in her Lyrics and Love Series!

NICK
Beautiful, broken, and abandoned.
The second I see her in my bar,
With cover charge stamps plastering her hands,
I know what I have to do.

Take her home,
Get her into bed,
Where I know she'll be safe.

I do exactly that.
Leaving her keys and my number,
As I lock the door behind me.

She deserves more,
So much more.

ASHLEY
Shattered, vulnerable, and alone,
Trapped in a lifetime of hurt,
Trying to break the cycle.

But he came in,
Saved me,
From myself,
From my circumstances.

Showing me compassion,
And respect.
Proving I am so much more.

More than just a pathetic drunk girl.

book.title: Iron Heart
book.description:
TORI

I‚Äôve been living on borrowed time since I was born.
My dreams were big. But my reality cut them down to size.
The life I‚Äôve settled for is small.
Safe.
Stifling.
Until I meet him.

He‚Äôs my forbidden fruit. My guilty pleasure. My greatest danger.
He has me dreaming of a life I never thought I could have.
He teaches me to hope. To want. To crave.

If I‚Äôm not careful, Dante D‚ÄôAgostino will have me dreaming of happily ever afters.
And that‚Äôs the most dangerous dream of all.


DANTE

I don‚Äôt believe in miracles.
Fairy tales are for chumps.
In my world, only the strong survive, and love is a weakness.

Then I meet her.
She‚Äôs no princess in a tower.
She‚Äôs a fighter. A warrior.
She‚Äôs the strongest woman I know.

Before I knew it, she set my life ablaze.
Then, before I could stop her, she melted my iron heart.

This sure as f*ck ain‚Äôt no fairy tale. I don‚Äôt know what the f*ck it is.

This Lois Lane doesn‚Äôt need a superman. She doesn‚Äôt want a protector.
But protect her I will. With my life if I have to.
Tori Lowe has changed my life forever.
And I‚Äôm never going back.

book.title: Out to Find Freedom
book.description:
Death and pain.
They surround me. Hold me hostage, refusing to let go.
But I want to survive. Want to fight. I just don‚Äôt know if I have it in me.
Maybe dying would be better.
It‚Äôs the break in the shadows that gives me hope.
When I look at him, all I can see is light.
So now I‚Äôm out to find freedom.


Private investigator Ryan Warden doesn‚Äôt know he‚Äôs moved next door to people he would put behind bars in an instant. Nor does he realise a sleepless night could lead him on the right track with the case he‚Äôs working on.
He certainly doesn‚Äôt expect Emerson Spence.
What he does know is he has to stay away from her. She‚Äôs been beaten and broken. She deserves to live freely while learning and experiencing things in life like any young woman should.
He‚Äôs too old for her. It‚Äôs better to stay away.
If he can.

book.title: It's Not Over (Fair Lakes #1)
book.description:
Gwen

Lately, life definitely isn't how I envisioned it. I had it all. The house, the job, the husband. Until one day, I didn't. I don't know when exactly things started to change between us, only that it did, and in a big way. So much so, I found myself standing before a judge and signing off on the end of my marriage. To the only man I've ever loved.

Now, he's back, fighting, and ready to prove to me that we made a mistake, that our love is worth giving this another chance. I'm not sure if he's right, but I know what my heart wants, and it wants him. My ex-husband.


Harrison

Why is it that you don't know the depths of your mistakes until you've already made them? I knew signing those papers was a bad idea, but I thought that's what she wanted. The minute we stepped foot out of that courtroom, it hit me. She's no longer mine.

That's when I also realized that I would do anything to change the past. I have so many regrets. Not her. I could never regret her, but how we ended. We never should have ended. I'm in for the battle of my life to convince her to give us another shot. I have a plan, one that will prove to her that it's not over.

book.title: Just One Kiss
book.description:
He broke her heart. Now, he‚Äôs back, and he‚Äôs determined to show her what they had isn‚Äôt over. . . and he can prove it with just one kiss.

Single mother Carly Collins likes predictability. However, when her son Jaden‚Äôs health is threatened, her neatly controlled world is tossed into a tailspin. Nothing is certain anymore, especially her feelings for Josh Dixon, Jaden‚Äôs father, her first love and the man responsible for shattering her heart sixteen years ago.

When Josh Dixon walked out of Harbor Pointe, he left behind his only shot at a real family. Now a successful tech mogul, the town rebel has found a cause‚Äîensure his son‚Äôs recovery and prove to Carly and Jaden that he‚Äôs not the same guy he was back then.

Carly and Josh are forced to wade through messy emotions and questions that have gone unanswered for years, which would be easier if not for the pesky feelings, every bit as strong and impossible to ignore as they ever were.

Will forgiveness win, giving Carly and Josh a second chance at love . . . or will the past prove too much to overcome?

A small town romance about first love second chances and how our most beautiful life might look nothing like we planned.

book.title: Down to You (Sixth Street Bands, #5)
book.description:
"A sexy, heartfelt rocker romance that packs an unforgettable emotional punch."‚Äî¬†Mary, USA Today¬†¬†‚Äã

A star on the rise.

Logan Cage, lead singer for¬†the hottest band out of Austin, has a dark past. And a secret that he can‚Äôt outrun. For years he‚Äôs been trying to find redemption in the spotlight. But on the eve of what could be his biggest break, it almost slips away.

Rock¬†music‚Äôs shattered princess

Tori Grayson had it all. Money. Fame. And an adoring husband to share the spotlight. But tragedy struck and took it all away. Six years later and she‚Äôs reinvented herself, founding a record label to keep the memory of those she lost alive.

And a¬†tour for the ages

When Logan winds up in jail, jeopardizing the tour that‚Äôs meant to keep Tori‚Äôs label afloat, she agrees to front his bond and join him on the road.

Neither of them was looking for love.
But sometimes fate has other plans.

Every story deserves a soundtrack.
And theirs is¬†epic.

DOWN TO YOU is a standalone rockstar romance with recurring characters from the Sixth Street Bands Series.

book.title: Victor (Chicago Blaze, #3)
book.description:
He‚Äôs a hockey star with a headboard full of notches. She‚Äôs a shy NHL concession worker at who‚Äôs never been kissed.

Lindy

They don‚Äôt call me Belinda Boring for nothing. It‚Äôs my name, after all. And for a 23-year-old with plain brown hair who still lives at home and gets tongue tied over nothing, it‚Äôs a fitting one. I‚Äôm not even one of those quiet girls with a hidden talent, unless making a mean order of nachos at the NHL arena I work at counts. My life consists of working, reading and harboring a secret crush on a hockey player who doesn‚Äôt know I exist. At least, until we accidentally meet and become unlikely friends.

Victor

I‚Äôm living the dream. A poor kid who worked his way into the NHL, I‚Äôll never forget where I came from, though I try to. My past follows me, a nagging reminder that I‚Äôll never be what everyone thinks I am. As the threat of my secret being exposed looms closer, my game slips, leaving me in danger of being cut from my team--the only family I have. I‚Äôm losing my hold on everything when a new friend helps me find hope. She‚Äôs nothing like the women I‚Äôm used to, but by the time I figure out that‚Äôs exactly why she‚Äôs right for me, I‚Äôve lost my chance with her. Somehow, I have to convince a woman who thinks she‚Äôs invisible that she‚Äôs the only one I see.

book.title: Absolute Pleasure (Dirty Sexy Fairy Tales #2)
book.description:
What would you sacrifice to save your family‚Äôs legacy?

Meet Hunter Wilder, a man that is terrified of happily ever after.

Hunter is used to dominating, taking control of situations and bending them to his will. He may live in a New York castle, but he‚Äôs no prince. Cursed by loss, Hunter is a closed book with an emptiness that he can‚Äôt escape.

Until he meets her.

Gabriella Darien may be gorgeous and driven, but her Cinderella story is more than it appears. The death of her father left her with a wicked stepmother intent on sabotaging the business her parents worked so hard to create.

One enchanted night of all-consuming and absolute pleasure brings two broken souls together. With a new version of their future finally in sight, a promise kept might cost them everything.

Will this Cinderella find her prince, or will they watch their happily ever after disappear at the stroke of midnight?

ABSOLUTE PLEASURE is a modern, sinfully seductive take on Cinderella. It is a stand-alone, second-chance fairy-tale romance. No cheating. No cliffhangers.

book.title: Total Surrender (Dirty Sexy Fairy Tales #1)
book.description:
How far would you go to make the man that destroyed your family pay?

Maddux Wilder is a man consumed, a beast in a three-piece suit. Rich and powerful, he built his empire with one thought in mind: revenge.

After years of patience and planning, the wait is finally over. Tonight, Maddux will finally watch Theodore Cole‚Äôs kingdom crumble. At a lavish ball in the New York City castle the Wilder siblings call home, the man that killed their parents will atone for his sins.

If only he‚Äôd planned for her.

Arabella Cole is Theodore‚Äôs only child; his cherished and sheltered daughter. She‚Äôs an innocent, captivating beauty that would do anything to save her loving father, including sacrificing herself.

With her freedom gone, she must surrender to a man she hates. A man that makes her want things she shouldn‚Äôt. A man that awakens deep, forbidden desires.

But everyone knows that roses don‚Äôt bloom in darkness.

Enter Maddux Wilder, a man that doesn‚Äôt believe in fairy tales.

Can the beauty tame the beast or will revenge cost them both everything that matters most?

book.title: All Grown Up
book.description:
A new, sexy standalone from #1 New York Times Bestseller, Vi Keeland.

When I first encountered Ford Donovan, I had no idea who he was‚Ä¶well, other than the obvious. Young, gorgeous, successful, smart. Did I mention young? If I did, it bears repeating. Ford Donovan was too young for me.

Let‚Äôs back up to how it all started. My best friend decided I needed to start dating again. So, without my knowledge, she set up a profile for me on a popular dating site‚Äîone that invited men ages twenty-one to twenty-seven to apply for a date. Those nicknamed Cunnilingus King were told they‚Äôd go straight to the top for consideration. The profile wasn‚Äôt supposed to go live. Another point that bears repeating‚Äîit wasn‚Äôt supposed to.

Nevertheless, that‚Äôs how I met Ford, and we started messaging. He made me laugh; yet I was adamant that because of his age, we could only be friends. But after weeks of wearing me down, I finally agreed to one date only‚Äîmy first after twenty years of being with my high school sweetheart. I knew it couldn‚Äôt last, but I was curious about him.

Though, you know what they say‚Ä¶curiosity kills the cat.

My legs wobbled walking into the restaurant.
Ford was seated at the bar. When he turned around, he took my breath away.
His sexy smile nearly melted my panties.
But‚Ä¶he looked so familiar.
As I got closer I realized why.
He was the son of the neighbor at our family‚Äôs summer home.
The boy next door.
Only now‚Ä¶he was all man.
I hadn‚Äôt seen him in years.
I left the restaurant and planned to put the entire crazy thing behind me.
Which I did. Until summer came.
And guess who decided to use his family‚Äôs summer home this year?

book.title: Brick (Dragon Runners, #5)
book.description:
In the beginning, there was one determined man and one strong woman. In their struggles, they created a dynasty.

Brick had one mission since he was a boy: become a Dragon Runner. The motorcycle club meant everything to him. Blood and bone from his brothers paid the Dragon‚Äôs dues time and time again. And watching it split apart was more than he could handle.

Then he met Betsey.

An unwanted daughter born into abuse, Betsy lived her life beatdown under a rigid thumb, never allowed to be herself. Her one goal was to leave her abusive family and be free. She fought on the losing end of that fight.

Then she met Brick.

book.title: Plan B (Best Laid Plans, #2)
book.description:
Mistakes were made, okay?

The moment I laid eyes on Kyle Kingston I knew he was a mistake. A satisfying, toe curling, hair pulling, best night of my life mistake, but a mistake all the same. I didn‚Äôt yet know his name, or who he was, but I knew he was a bad idea.

I take comfort in that, because it means my instincts are still good. Too late, but it‚Äôs something. ‚Ä®‚Ä®

Because, FYI, I‚Äôm pregnant

‚Ä¶ and did I mention my baby daddy is both heir to a retail empire and impossible to get ahold of?

I do what any girl would. I break into his Grandfather‚Äôs retirement gala by telling the prissy gatekeeper Kyle‚Äôs my fianc√©. It was a halfway decent plan at the time, trust me.

But it blows up in my face, disastrously so. You see, Kyle Kingston is all about representing the family values his family‚Äôs retail empire was founded on. At least in public. In private- well I‚Äôll tell you about that later.

He proposes ‚Äì a marriage of convenience.

Convenient for everyone but me, because while I‚Äôm falling in love with my convenient husband, he‚Äôs keeping a billion-dollar secret. From me.

book.title: Saint (Knights of Fury, #1)
book.description:
From the New York Times bestselling author of the Wind Dragons and Cursed Ravens MC series comes sinners, saints and secrets‚Ä¶

Dear Skylar,

Five years. That‚Äôs a long time to go without talking to somebody, especially someone who was such a huge part of your life‚Ä¶

A letter from my first kiss and my childhood everything‚Ä¶from prison.

He may be nicknamed Saint, but this sweet, sexy biker most definitely has a wild streak. Hearing from him draws me right back into the Knights of Fury motorcycle club‚Äîthe people I‚Äôll always think of as family.

He‚Äôs still the only man I‚Äôve ever wanted.

Each good, old-fashioned letter from my ‚Äúprison pen pal‚Äù has my heart racing. Which is nothing compared to how I feel when Saint surprises me in person, as a free man.

I was just a kid the last time we saw each other, but the connection between us now is anything but innocent.

He‚Äôs the type of man who would do anything to protect his woman. And with my world crashing down around me, that‚Äôs exactly what I‚Äôm going to need.

This book is approximately 67,000 words



Please note: This book is part of the Knights of Fury MC series but can be read as a stand-alone.



One-click with confidence. This title is part of the Carina Press Romance Promise : all the romance you‚Äôre looking for with an HEA/HFN. It‚Äôs a promise!

book.title: Changing Lines (Bellevue Bullies, #5)
book.description:
Claire and Jude Sinclair have been living the perfect life for the last ten years.

Blissfully in love, professionally successful, happily married‚Ä¶ They have everything they want‚Äîexcept a baby to make their family complete.

On the eve of the birth of the baby they‚Äôre planning to adopt, Jude gets traded to another hockey team in another state, and their thoughtfully planned-out road to parenthood hits a speed bump.

But they didn‚Äôt survive all the turmoil of their pasts to get knocked out now. This is their game seven, and they won‚Äôt accept anything less than a win for the family they‚Äôre destined to have.

book.title: Cold Hearted Baller
book.description:
I have three superstitions I live by:
1. No dating all season.
2. Don‚Äôt jinx a no-hitter while one‚Äôs in progress.
3. Be cold-hearted. If you find something you think about more than baseball, destroy it.

Calliope Thomas is one of those things. Ever since she left a bad review on the Max Energy Drink I endorse, I haven‚Äôt been able to stop thinking about her. Obviously, when she said she hoped I had a losing season, I had to meet her and get her to take the words back.

Now, she‚Äôs making me do insane things. Like, obsess over the color of her panties or if I can make her blush. Read superstition one‚ÄîI don‚Äôt do this sort of thing.
I play ball, not chase after a woman I barely know.

But, I am, and she wants nothing to do with me.
She thinks I‚Äôm the devil.
And I have to say she makes me want to sin.

I‚Äôm becoming a borderline stalker.
And to make matters worse she‚Äôs affecting my game.
I can‚Äôt pitch.
I can‚Äôt hit.
I can‚Äôt focus.
Something needs to give, and it won‚Äôt be me.

book.title: Hurricane Hearts
book.description:
A standalone Storm MC Reloaded novel.

She walked away from me five years ago.
She ran and took my heart with her.
Now I want it back, and hers too.
She can tell me no.
She can try to hide.
She can take her time.
But I‚Äôm a man on my knees.
Birdie Beaumont will be mine again.

My first lie had been to save us.
My second lie had been to save him.
My third lie broke me.
I still love him just as much as I did when I left him.
But I can‚Äôt have him.
Not after what I did.
Not after keeping it from him all this time.
Winter Morrison will never forgive me for what I did.

book.title: RORY: Brothers Ink Tattoo (Brothers Ink Tattoo Series Book #4)
book.description:
It was just supposed to be a one-night stand‚Äî Until he stole her life story and put it in a song.
Now he‚Äôs rock‚Äôs hottest new artist‚Äî And she‚Äôs just found out she‚Äôs having his baby.

Rory is a pierced and inked tattoo artist by day at Brothers Ink, but by night he‚Äôs lead guitarist for the heavy metal rock band, Convicted Chrome. He‚Äôs headed East on his Harley to catch up with the tour. Beautiful Rayne is headed West on her motorcycle with her girl squad‚Ä¶the Moto Babes. When rain forces them all to take refuge in the same motel, sparks fly. A night of drinking and karaoke leads to a connection deeper than either of them expects.

Rayne ‚Äî What do you do when someone writes a song about your most private feelings and experiences and you hear it on the radio for the first time? What do you do when that song is climbing the charts, and the man who stole your life story is suddenly rock‚Äôs hottest new artist? What do you do when you find out you‚Äôre having his baby?

Rory ‚Äî After a long songwriting drought, he‚Äôs met a woman who sparked something in him and got his creative juices flowing. He‚Äôs written one of his best songs ever. When a friend in the business gives him the break of a lifetime he‚Äôs suddenly topping the charts. But Rory‚Äôs not ready for the instant stratosphere of success he‚Äôs catapulted into. Caught up in a whirlwind career that offers temptations and sin at every turn, is Rory losing the biggest part of himself?

To fix his career and more importantly himself, he‚Äôll have to go back and fix the damage he‚Äôs done and apologize to the people he‚Äôs wronged in the past.

And one person in particular tops that list.

book.title: Animal's Reformation (Insurgents MC, #13)
book.description:
Sometimes the last person you want to be with is the one you can‚Äôt be without

A member of the Insurgents MC, Animal is a rough, free-loving biker. Hanging with his brothers, riding his customized Harley, and partying with the ladies are his idea of the ideal life.

Years ago, he made a stupid mistake with a woman he barely knew, but he pays the child support every month and sends cards and presents to his out-of-state daughter on her birthday and on holidays.

He doesn‚Äôt want a steady woman, and he certainly isn‚Äôt ready to settle down and have a family. Life is just too good now, and there are always so many women who want to come and play with this rugged biker.

Then one afternoon, the mother of his child struts into the clubhouse with his daughter in tow and tells him she‚Äôs done. She walks away, leaving Animal and Lucy staring at each other.

What‚Äôs he supposed to do? He knows about bikes and hard partying, not seven-year-old girls.

He has to change his ways, and his new hot next-door neighbor isn‚Äôt helping to keep his libido in check. The way her long dark hair swings just above her sweet behind has him thinking all kinds of nasty thoughts, but she doesn‚Äôt give him the time of day.

Olivia Mooney is very aware of her neighbor‚Äôs good looks and his finely chiseled body, but she doesn‚Äôt want to get involved. He doesn‚Äôt realize it, but she‚Äôs his daughter‚Äôs tutor at school, and she can‚Äôt get involved. She spends her nights thinking about the sexy single father and chatting with an intriguing man on an after dark dating site.

Then a series of murders occur in the surrounding counties, and it looks like they are creeping closer to Pinewood Springs. At first the cops are stumped, but over time a pattern begins to emerge: the women all used an after dark dating site.

As fear and danger slink closer, Olivia is thrown into the arms of the sexy biker, forever changing their lives.
