Before I know it I'm spilling everything to him. He keeps me out of jail... but not out of trouble. He has a wicked idea to get back at my newly dubbed ex...

Get married.

That's right. Steal my ex's thunder by getting married.

To me, there are worse things than having a one night thing and saying "I do" to a good looking cop with a killer smile.

Once the ring is on my finger and that first night of wedded bliss comes to an end, my new husband has to go work... and I'm left to ask: now what?

Hey darlin' ... this is a 40,000 word insta-love, full length, HEA romance novel.¬†¬†

book.title: Her Prince (The Wounded Souls Book 6 )
book.description:
COMING SOON

I had secrets that were drowning me, and my worst fear was he was going to get
tired of waiting for me to put my big girl panties on and reveal the biggest one.

Him.

Shiloh

My life started out with a tragedy‚Äîthe death of my mother.
But I had something no other infant had, six amazing men. My father and his brothers in arms raised me and gave me the best life any kid could ask for.
I grew up in the loving arms of the Wounded Souls, and each and every one of them protected and loved me beyond measure. Even when I lost two of the most important people in my life, the Souls never let me fall.
After Dad met and married the best woman I had the pleasure of knowing, she and her flock, also wonderful women, gave me the feminine balance I needed in a life of soldiers turned bikers. They taught me to rise to every challenge and always be true to myself.
Somewhere, I lost sight of that on the way to my aspirations to make my mark.
Falling in love with a man who would die for me, adored me, and would do anything for me, should have been the happiest time of my life. So why was I hiding him?
Could I really have it all? Or would my obsession with being everything and having it all mean I would lose the one person who meant everything?
Then there was my ghost. Having him and his promise not to leave me was both a blessing and a curse. He knew all my secrets, and he also knew how to press my buttons.

The danger of Rogue is a distant memory, and the kids of the Wounded Souls are all grown up. The club princess has big dreams and even bigger secrets. Will she keep her dreams alive and keep the love of her prince?

book.title: The Wrong Highlander (Highland Brides, #7)
book.description:
A laird's daughter kidnaps a Highlander‚Äîand loses her heart‚Ä¶ in New York Times bestselling author Lynsay Sands' new historical romance...

Lady Evina Maclean has heard much about Rory Buchanan's skill as a healer. What she hasn't heard is how good the brawny Highlander looks bathing in a waterfall. But Evina can't afford the distraction, for her ailing father urgently needs care. Only when she's rendered Buchanan unconscious and dragged him back to her family's castle does the truth emerge‚Äîit's not Rory she's kidnapped but his brother Conran.

Other ladies try to ensnare Conran with flattery. Evina hits him over the head with the hilt of her sword to save her kin‚Äîand Conran likes the spirited redhead all the more for it. He's learned enough from his brother to heal Evina's father, but there are other dangers swirling around the Maclean clan. And while the beautiful, independent lady has sworn not to marry, this wrong Highlander may be just the right man for her.

book.title: Waiting for Willa (Big Sky, #3)
book.description:
Waiting for Willa

From New York Times Bestselling Author Kristen Proby comes the newest installment in her beloved Big Sky Series‚Ä¶

Max Hull left Cunningham Falls a long time ago. Thanks to his killer instincts and business smarts, he‚Äôs come back to town richer than anyone‚Äôs wildest imagination. Now he‚Äôs closer to his family, living in his dream home, and at the top of his career‚Äîit sure looks like he has it all.

All but one thing. And she‚Äôs not interested.

Willa Monroe and Max were childhood sweethearts. She daydreamed about their wedding day and named their children, but Max‚Äôs dreams were bigger than her. After high school, he left her behind without another word. Now, Willa is a single mother and a successful business owner, and the heartbreak of losing Max was a very long time ago.

She‚Äôs moved on.

But when he walks into her shop and back into her life, suddenly it feels like no time has passed at all. He‚Äôs as handsome as ever, and more charming than she remembered. Once he makes friends with her son and turns his attention on her, how long will she be able to resist him?

And does she really want to? Sometimes you do get a second chance at first love.

book.title: Dax (Arizona Vengeance, #4)
book.description:
The Arizona Vengeance is killing it on the ice. But one player can‚Äôt seem to keep his eye on the puck‚Äîall thanks to the woman he just married to save her life.
¬†
‚ÄúFind your next hockey hero in Sawyer Bennett‚Äôs Arizona Vengeance series.‚Äù‚ÄîNew York Times bestselling author Jill Shalvis
¬†
My name is Dax Monahan and hockey is my passion. And if you want to succeed in this sport you have to bust your ass 24/7. I‚Äôve never had a hard time focusing on my career, but when my past comes knocking, no amount of training can prepare me for what lies on the other side of the door.
¬†
Regan Miles was always like a sister to me. When a shared tragedy brings us face to face after several years, I‚Äôm shocked to see just how much she‚Äôs changed. Gone is the shy, awkward little girl that always used to chase me and her brother around. Instead, I‚Äôm faced with a gorgeous woman who makes it damn hard to concentrate on anything but her.

Turns out, she‚Äôs in trouble, and the only way out is to get married.

I surprise myself when I tell her to marry me. Order her, actually. And most shocking of all, she doesn‚Äôt even hesitate before saying yes.
¬†
So it‚Äôs settled. We‚Äôre getting hitched and she‚Äôs moving to Arizona with me.¬† All platonic, of course.
¬†
The catch?
I never knew I‚Äôd fall so hard for my best friend‚Äôs little sister.

The Arizona Vengeance series from New York Times bestselling author Sawyer Bennett can be read together or separately:
BISHOP
ERIK
LEGEND
DAX

And don‚Äôt miss her Carolina Cold Fury novels:
ALEX
GARRETT
ZACK
RYKER
HAWKE
MAX
ROMAN
LUCAS
VAN
REED
MAREK

The Love Hurts series features sexy standalone novels:
SEX IN THE STICKS
JILTED

And the Sugar Bowl series is one treat you‚Äôll want to read in order:
SUGAR DADDY
SUGAR RUSH
SUGAR FREE

This ebook includes an excerpt from another Loveswept title.

book.title: Tacker (Arizona Vengeance, #5)
book.description:
I am not okay.

Fifteen months ago, my life was turned upside down when the plane I was piloting went down. Injured and trapped in the wreckage, I had to watch my fianc√©e die a painfully slow death, which is something that can really mess with your head.

Since that day, I‚Äôve had little desire to do much of anything. Except play hockey, that is. Because that is the one place where the bad memories are banished and I can escape my pain.

But off the ice, I‚Äôm spiraling out of control. Losing the grip on my life and putting myself and my career in danger. Now, thanks to a string of bad decisions, I‚Äôve been ordered to complete therapy in order to stay on the team.

The problem? Nora Wayne, my beautiful and somewhat unconventional therapist. I can‚Äôt buy into the brand of happy clappy crap this woman is feeding me. What could she possibly understand about the type of loss that I‚Äôve suffered? How does she know anything about finding happiness after losing the most important person in your life?

Turns out, I‚Äôve got a lot to learn, and she‚Äôs just the person I need to break through those walls I‚Äôve erected.

I am not okay.
But for the first time in a long time, I know that I will be.

book.title: Acceptance (The Chicago Defiance MC Series #5)
book.description:
Try to forget.
It's easier said than done.

My past‚Äîviolently haunts my dreams.
My present‚Äîbelongs to an MC. My brothers, my support, my family, my life.

But what if you left someone behind?
You failed them.
And set in motion a series of events no one could have predicted.
But in deserting him, you found her.
A constant. A guiding light. A connection that can't possibly not be right.
Or is it?
This story isn‚Äôt just two souls finding their connection‚Äîit‚Äôs lust, treachery, misery, and brutality.

Vengeance‚Äîwill thrill you.

But will I be able to gain my acceptance?

book.title: Copper (Hell's Handlers MC #4)
book.description:
Enormous, commanding, and hotter than sin, Copper is the only man Shell has ever wanted. Even as a young teen, when it was impossible and taboo to capture the attention of a grown man, she longed for him. For years, Shell clung to the dream of turning eighteen and finally being noticed by the Hell‚Äôs Handlers‚Äô rough and gruff president. But the universe had other plans, and she was forced to make a horrible choice. A choice that altered the course of her life forever, sealing her fate and ensuring the dream of being Copper‚Äôs ol‚Äô lady would never materialize.

Sixteen years his junior. Daughter of his MC‚Äôs former president. Single mother whose deadbeat sperm donor doesn‚Äôt provide an ounce of support. Loved as a younger sister by every man in the club. The list of reasons goes on for Copper to stay away from Shell. Problem is, he‚Äôs been hot for her for years. Copper finally gets some relief when she moves out of Tennessee, but once she‚Äôs back, all those reasons to keep his distance grow weaker by the day.

Unable to fight against his own judgment any longer, Copper finally claims Shell for his own. But once again the universe steps in, revealing secrets with the power to destroy them both.

Shell will do anything for Copper, even tear out her own heart and confront the most agonizing parts of her past. But will she be too late to save her dream? Will she be too late to save Copper?

book.title: Juicy Rebound (IceCats, #1)
book.description:
Chandler Moon‚Äôs career as a defensemen for the IceCats is on fire. However, his marriage has gone up in flames‚Ä¶ literally. He‚Äôs resigned himself to the single life and being the best dog dad he can be, but he still holds out hope that one day he‚Äôll find ‚ÄúThe One.‚Äù So, imagine his surprise when he runs into ‚ÄúThe One Who Got Away.‚Äù

Amelia Justice.
His best friend‚Äôs baby sister.
AKA: ‚ÄúThe One Who Is Totally Off-Limits.‚Äù
Amelia is broken. The punches that life, and her ex-husband, have thrown at her have her down for the count. She‚Äôs cut herself off from her family and friends as she works to rebuild her self-esteem and her spirit. Hidden away in a small town, she never expects to reconnect with ‚ÄúThe One She Should Have Chosen.‚Äù

Chandler is so much more than he was in college: more handsome, more muscular, more tattooed‚Ä¶ It was supposed to be a casual fling while Amelia and Chandler worked to put the pieces of their lives back together.

But as every good hockey player knows, a rebound can turn into one hell of a goal.

book.title: Remedy
book.description:
It took one night with her to know she was my forever.
It took one minute for me to climb out of bed and drive away from her.
It‚Äôs taken me three years to confess that leaving her behind was the biggest mistake of my life.

I won‚Äôt stop until she knows what she means to me. I‚Äôll convince her to listen to her heart.


It took one night for all of my dreams to come true.
It took one morning, waking up alone, for those same dreams to come crashing down around me.
It‚Äôs taken me three years to confess that night changed me forever.

He says this time is different, but how do I open my heart up to a man who‚Äôs already ripped it to shreds?

book.title: Take Me Again (The Knight Brothers, #1)
book.description:
He's used to getting what he wants... but she‚Äôs going to make him work for it.

Sebastian Knight is a closer. Be it a real estate deal or the woman of his choice, everything he wants is his for the taking.

Sexy and irresistible, a wink, a smile, or a handshake always seals the deal.

Until everything unravels around him.

After Ashley Easton‚Äôs social climbing mother married into the Knight family, Ashley knew better than to get involved with sexy, trouble making Sebastian Knight but their attraction is undeniable, their chemistry intense, and in a moment of weakness, she turns to him, a mistake that cost her her home and her family. After she was sent away, she swore she‚Äôd never come back.

Sebastian never expected to see Ashley, the one woman he‚Äôs never been able to get over, again.

When she walks back into his life at the worst possible time, more beautiful than ever, he‚Äôs ready for a second chance. She‚Äôs sassy and sexy everything he‚Äôs ever desired. And she‚Äôs back for good. Except Ashley wants nothing to do with the playboy who broke her heart. Too bad his sex appeal makes it harder and harder to keep him at arm‚Äôs length.

Sebastian Knight might have a talent for sealing the deal but this is one game he‚Äôs going to have to work to win.

book.title: We Shouldn't
book.description:
Bennett Fox walked into my life on one hell of a crappy Monday morning.

I was late for the first day at my new job‚Äîa job I‚Äôd now have to compete for even though I‚Äôd already worked eight years to earn it, because of an unexpected merger.

While I lugged my belongings up to my new office, a meter maid wrote me a parking summons.

She‚Äôd ticketed a long line of cars‚Äîexcept for the Audi parked in front of me, which happened to be the same make and model as mine.

Annoyed, I decided to regift my ticket to the car that had evaded a fine. Chances were, the owner would pay it and be none the wiser.

Except, I accidentally broke the windshield wiper while slipping the ticket onto the car‚Äôs window.

Seriously, my day couldn‚Äôt get any worse.

Things started to perk up when I ran into a gorgeous man in the elevator. We had one of those brief moments that only happened in movies.

You know the deal‚Ä¶your body lights up, fireworks go off, and the air around you crackles with electricity.

His heated stare left me flush when I stepped off the elevator.

Maybe things here wouldn‚Äôt be so bad after all.

Or so I thought.

Until I walked into my new boss‚Äôs office and met my competition.

The gorgeous man from the elevator was now my nemesis. His heated stare wasn‚Äôt because of any mutual attraction. It was because he‚Äôd seen me vandalize his car. And now he couldn‚Äôt wait to annihilate his rival.

There‚Äôs a fine line between love and hate‚Äîand we shouldn‚Äôt cross it.

We shouldn‚Äôt‚Äîbut straddling that line could be so much fun.

book.title: Heart of Ashes (Hearts of the Highlands #1)
Hook (Men of Inked: Southside, #3)
book.description:
Falling in love is supposed to be the easy part.

But nothing prepared me for losing my wife. I promised her that I‚Äôd love again. Find someone to mend my broken heart. And that seems impossible, until the day that I walk into Tilly Carter‚Äôs cupcake shop.

I‚Äôve never met a woman like her‚Äîsassy, dirty-mouthed, and smells like vanilla and sin. Someone that makes me want to sweep her off her feet.

But there‚Äôs pain in her emerald eyes that mirrors my own.
A past that neither of us can truly escape.

Now that I have her, I‚Äôll do anything to keep her.

Hook is the third book in the STANDALONE USA Today bestselling Men of Inked: Southside series.

Book 1 - Maneuver
Book 2 - Flow
Book 3 - Hook
Book 4 - Hustle

book.title: The Consequence of Falling
book.description:
The list of things I hate is short. Not even my soon-to-be ex-husband is on that list. Nope. I save only the worst of the worst, the cr√®me de la cr√®me, the absolute I cannot even for this list . . .

1. Black coffee
2. Rude people
3. Nathaniel Bradley

Which is why when my father informs me that he‚Äôs making Nathaniel Bradley his new business partner, and in turn, my boss, I flip out.

1. He‚Äôs an annoying know-it-all.
2. He calls me a spoiled princess every chance he gets.
3. He disapproves of everything I do.

I go into this knowing I‚Äôll hate every second in his presence. Except the longer he‚Äôs around, the more I find myself staring at his lips and remembering the one time they were on mine. I randomly find myself looking at his hands and wondering how they‚Äôd feel on my skin.
I try to snap out of it, but I guess I‚Äôm not as smart as I thought I was. No matter how many times I remind myself of the times I‚Äôve practically thrown myself at him and he‚Äôs pushed me away, I keep falling little by little.

I‚Äôd always heard that it was a bad idea to mix business with pleasure and if that‚Äôs the case, this thing with Nathaniel has demise written all over it.

book.title: Ransom (Laurel Springs Emergency Response Team #1)
book.description:
A new series from the author of the Moonshine Task Force Series!

Laurel Springs, AL is about to be hotter than a mid-August thunderstorm.

When the Moonshine Task Force is absorbed into a new entity, Laurel Springs Emergency Response Team (LSERT) new faces come to town, new love is born, old love is found again, and there‚Äôs a plethora of drama and romance happening all over the tri-county area. LSERT puts police, firefighters, nurses, doctors, K-9 handlers, and EMT‚Äôs all in harm‚Äôs way as they work to keep the area safe from any threat.

When emotions are high, passions ignite.

Come with me, back to Laurel Springs, in what's sure to be a wild ride!

Ransom Thompson

For years I‚Äôve wanted two things - to be a member of the Moonshine Task Force and to be the man Stella Kepler can‚Äôt live without.

One out of two isn‚Äôt bad, or so I tell myself. Being the only K-9 handler for The MTF presents its own share of obstacles, but me and Rambo? We make it work. Life is status quo, until I‚Äôm called in to help with what appears to be a hostage situation and Stella is right in the middle of it.

This is my one chance, and I‚Äôm not going to blow it.


Stella Kepler

When I‚Äôm stuck in an examination room holding a hurt woman and a man with a gun, I do the only thing I can. I sneak out, call 911 and hope help comes quickly. It does.

In the form of Ransom Thompson.

He and I have known each other since we were babies. Our mother‚Äôs are friends, our dad‚Äôs work together, and we‚Äôve always been friends.

Only, the last few months I‚Äôve started to notice things. How mature he is, how alpha he can be, the chiseled six-pack, and the abundance of ink spreading across his body.

When I offer to cook him dinner for saving me, neither one of us know how that one moment will change the course of the rest of our lives.

book.title: Devil's Daughter (The Ravenels, #5)
book.description:
New York Times bestselling author Lisa Kleypas delivers a scintillating tale of a beautiful, young widow who finds passion with the one man she shouldn't...

Although beautiful young widow Phoebe, Lady Clare, has never met West Ravenel, she knows one thing for certain: he's a mean, rotten bully. Back in boarding school, he made her late husband's life a misery, and she'll never forgive him for it. But when Phoebe attends a family wedding, she encounters a dashing and impossibly charming stranger who sends a fire-and-ice jolt of attraction through her. And then he introduces himself...as none other than West Ravenel.

West is a man with a tarnished past. No apologies, no excuses. However, from the moment he meets Phoebe, West is consumed by irresistible desire...not to mention the bitter awareness that a woman like her is far out of his reach. What West doesn't bargain on is that Phoebe is no straitlaced aristocratic lady. She's the daughter of a strong-willed wallflower who long ago eloped with Sebastian, Lord St. Vincent‚Äîthe most devilishly wicked rake in England.

Before long, Phoebe sets out to seduce the man who has awakened her fiery nature and shown her unimaginable pleasure. Will their overwhelming passion be enough to overcome the obstacles of the past?

Only the devil's daughter knows...

book.title: Sufferance (The Chicago Defiance MC, #4)
book.description:
We were destined.
But time and fate are not on our side.

My president‚Äîher blood brother.
My patch‚Äîso close I can taste it.

Yet, I have to choose. Is there really a choice?
My club or the girl.
This woman shines brightly. She's adored, worshiped, and cherished by everyone, not only me. I'm just the unlucky prospect who fell for her.
But we're complicated. I want my patch, but I can't have her and it at the same time.

This story isn't only about a man fighting to have both‚Äîit‚Äôs secrets, battles, defection, and scandal.

Betrayal‚Äîit‚Äôs imminent.

How will we deal with our sufferance?

book.title: Shadow (Satan's Fury MC: Memphis, #2)
book.description:
She brought light into my world of shadows.

New York Times and USA Today Best Seller L. Wilder brings readers a new addition to the Satan's Fury Memphis series.

The club was at war, fighting an unknown enemy, and as Satan Fury's new enforcer, I was determined to do my brothers proud- no matter what the cost.

Alex Carpenter was a distraction I didn't need nor want. My focus should've been on the club and our latest adversary, but she was a temptation I couldn't resist. Her beauty and innocence captivated me, and just being near her made the shadows of my past seem less daunting. I let her in, but quickly realized that her walls were even more guarded than my own.

When our worlds collide and secrets are unveiled, will our love be strong enough to mend our broken souls or will we continue to be imprisoned by our past?

Shadow is book two of the Satan's Fury MC- Memphis Chapter. This full-length standalone novel is intended for mature audiences only due to the explicit language and violence. Contains no cheating and a swoon-worthy HEA.

Mayhem Cover Creations - Illustrator
Lisa Cullinan - Editor
Wander Aguiar - Photographer

book.title: Everything Worth Fighting For
book.description:
Fate.
Destiny.
Whatever you wanted to call it, Macy Caldwell was mine.
She had a chance to get out of this town, but she refused to take it.
She was going to give up everything for me.
I wasn‚Äôt worth that kind of sacrifice.
In order to save her, I had to break her.


The night Nash Masters broke my heart was the catalyst for the ruin that came after.
All these years later, he was fighting for my forgiveness.
He had no idea I was the one who needed his.
The truth didn‚Äôt always set you free.
They said love conquered all, but this was war.
And everything worth having was worth fighting for.

book.title: Blaze (Satan's Fury MC: Memphis, #1)
book.description:
She was the light to my darkness.

New York Times and USA Today Best Seller L. Wilder brings readers a new Satan's Fury series that is guaranteed to keep you on the edge of your seat.

Blaze:
In Memphis, Tennessee, Satan's Fury MC had become the most notorious MC in the city. That recognition hadn't come easy. While people were visiting Graceland and walking down on Beale Street, my brothers and I were at war, fighting rival MCs and gangs who were trying to take control of our territory.

We had staked our claim, but when a new threat arrived, everything we had worked for would be put in jeopardy.

Kenadee Brooks was a nurse, trying to save lives and make a difference in the world. The moment I saw her, it wasn't just her beauty that caught my eye. It was the light that burned deep inside of her that drew me in. I longed for it, and with each moment I spent with her, the more determined I became to make her mine.

But when she was pulled into my world, saw the life that I lived, would that light I craved still burn bright or would it disappear forever?


Blaze is book one of the Satan's Fury MC- Memphis Chapter. This full-length standalone novel is intended for mature audiences only due to the explicit language and violence. Contains no cheating and a swoon-worthy HEA.
